track.name: Talking to the Moon
comments:
At night when the stars light up my room
I sit by myself talking to the moon
Trying to get to you
In hopes you're on the other side
Talking to me too
or am i fool who sits alone talking to the moon ___
This should be dedicated to his mother Bernadette Hernendez RIP.
Omg, first listen...i love it alot!  Kinda sounds like "When I Was Your Man"..now only those two songs are a fav..i out grow his songs quickly, lol!
Wow, what a great song!!! I just love Bruno Mars' voice! ♥
If you like Bruno Mars this is your site. Please, Join Us! Bruno Mars
one of his best songs if not his best song
Love at first listen. [106] thank you B.A.P.
im ususally not one for slower music, cuz i love upbeat tempos, but i love this song :)
